EmailTemplate.subject: Five Star Professional Invoice
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!kugo2p__SalesOrder__c.Contact_Billing_First_Name__c},
Thank you for your recent order and congratulations on being named a Five Star Award Winner! We believe that promoting your Five Star award status is an excellent way to differentiate you from your competition.
For your convenience, we are providing you with an invoice receipt for your records. You may cancel your order for any reason within five business days from your order date with the exception of showcases which cannot be cancelled. This cancellation request must be in writing and sent to billing@fivestarprofessional.com. If you request to cancel your order after the five business days, we will review the status of the products within your order and get back to you promptly. Please note there is a non-refundable deposit of 20% after the five business days have passed.
To view your invoice receipt, or to download a PDF copy for your records, click the link below:
{!kugo2p__SalesOrder__c.Invoice_Link__c}
Please note that if you elected a financing plan for this order, the balance due amount on this invoice does not include any future payments due to Five Star Professional.
Feel free to contact us if you have any questions.
*For questions about your products, please contact your Client Success Representative: 888-438-5782, option 1
*For additional product needs, please contact your Account Manager: 888-438-5782, option 3
*For questions about billing, please contact: 888-438-5782, Option 2 or billing@fivestarprofessional.com
Once again, we appreciate your business.
Kind regards,
Accounts Receivable
